  • 30 day

    Money-Back Guarantee

    Changed your mind? Not absolutely in love with it? We offer straightforward, no-fuss returns for 30 days. Simply get in touch with us to arrange a return and refund.

  • 24/7

    Support

    Have a question? Our friendly customer support team can help you with any queries, concerns or product tips. We’ll always aim get back to you within 24 hours

  • 1 year

    Warranty

    We’ve got you covered if your device breaks or malfunctions due to no fault of your own. All warranties are automatically activated at the date of your purchase

SIMPLE, no fuss RETURNS

  • Get in touch with our customer support team at support@pulsio.co.uk and a friendly representative will provide the returns form and help you return your order.
  • Returns must be made within 30 days from your purchase date. Items must be returned in the same condition in which it was received with all accessories returned, unmarked and in the original packaging. We reserve the right to refuse a refund if these conditions are not met.
  • Your refund will be processed within 2-5 business days of receipt of return.

Shipping charges

  • Shipping charges for the return of the order are the responsibility of the customer, and are non-refundable. We always recommend selecting a Tracked or Recorded service as Pulsio cannot be held responsible for any undelivered or delayed returns.
  • Please note that additional delivery costs chosen at checkout where applicable, will not be refunded. This applies for international deliveries to Ireland or if an additional or upgraded delivery method is chosen (such as Special Delivery, or 24 Hour Tracked delivery).

RETURN COSTS

Product
warranty

Shipping charges for the return of the order are the responsibility of the customer, and are non-refundable. We always recommend selecting a Tracked or Recorded service as Pulsio cannot be held responsible for any undelivered or delayed returns.

Please note that additional delivery costs chosen at checkout where applicable, will not be refunded. This applies for international deliveries to Ireland or if an additional or upgraded delivery method is chosen (such as Special Delivery, or 24 Hour Tracked delivery).
